author: ehu
msg: Update STATUS to reflect changes in r10524.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix the bug whereby a test raising svntest.Skip would cause the exit
status of the entire test run to be non-zero.  Thanks to Christian
Schaffner and Brian W. Fitzpatrick for analysis.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/svntest/testcase.py
(_Predicate.convert_result): New name for convert_error().  All
callers and overriding classes adjusted accordingly.
(_Predicate.skip_text): Call arg 'result' not 'error'.
(TestCase.run): Don't bother to set error in SVNTestStatusCodeError
case, because the error will never be used anyway.  Document.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/svntest/main.py
(_internal_run_tests): Don't exit non-zero unless actual test
failure happened.

author: ehu
msg: Greatly improve (but alas not complete) Polish translation by merging
* subversion/po/pl.po: Merge latest updates.

author: ehu
msg: Copy Japanese translation now that it has had review.
* subversion/po/ja.po: copy from trunk after review on the
Japanese Subversion mailing list <subversion-jp@m.bluegate.org>.

author: breser
msg: Perl SWIG bindings INSTALL instructions additions.
* subversion/bindings/swig/INSTALL
The integrated method doesn't work for many binary packagers
becuase they need to pass through lots of perl specific environment
variables that make doesn't understand.
